#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <math.h>
using namespace std;
 
double arr[2502][2502] = {0.0};
double number(int x, int y){
	if(x>y || x < 0 || y > 2500){ 
		return 0.0;
	}
	if(x==y){
		return (x*1.0);
	}
	if(x<y){
		if(arr[x][y]!=0) return arr[x][y];
		arr[x][y] = ( x*1.0/y*(1+number(x-1,y-1))  + ((y-x)*1.0/(y*(y-1)))  *  ( (1+x)*(1+number(x,y-2)) + (y-x-2)*(1+number(x+2,y-2)) +x));
		return (arr[x][y]);
	}
}
int main(){
	int n,m = 0;
	arr[0][2]=1.0;
	while (!cin.eof()){
		cin >> n;
		cin >> m;
		n=n*m;
		if(!cin.eof()){
			cout << fixed << setprecision(4)<< number(0,n) << endl;
		}
	}
}
